alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Eaton; Gratiot; Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ingham, eastern Gratiot, Clinton and northeastern Eaton Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ithaca to near Laingsburg. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. The greatest threat for strong winds will be near Ashley and Elsie. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lansing... St. Johns... Ithaca... East Lansing... Breckenridge... Elsie... Edgemont Park... DeWitt... Capital Region Inter... Eureka... Wheeler... Ovid... North Star... Maple Rapids... Ashley... Waverly... Perrinton... Wacousta... Bath... Bannister... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
